name: Core Server
description: This is the central point of RORI. This application get data from entry points, call modules to process this data and send data to endpoints to execute commands.

name: IRC Bot
description: IRC Entry Module is an entry and an endpoint for RORI. This application run an IRC bot based on this library to interact with RORI.

name: Discord Bot
description: RORI Discord Bot is an entry and an endpoint for RORI. This application is designed for a bot user on Discord based on this library to interact with RORI.

name: Desktop Endpoint
description: This is a simple endpoint for RORI. Just a simple application to execute shell and music commands from rori_server on linux.
